titleStmt.title: The Wiltshire-petition for tythes explained, for the better understanding of the people of this Commonwealth. Herein you have first the petition it self at large inserted, and then the observations follow, being directed to each material passage in the petition by a letter of the alphabet. By E.C. and R.E.
titleStmt.author: E. C.

titleStmt.title: The Wiltshire-petition for tythes explained, for the better understanding of the people of this Commonwealth. Herein you have first the petition it self at large inserted, and then the observations follow, being directed to each material passage in the petition by a letter of the alphabet. By E.C. and R.E.
titleStmt.author: E. C.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Larnar, at the Black-moor's head neer Fleet-bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
